body_content.explanation: the act of making or doing something again in exactly the same way, or something that is made or done in this way:
examples: Replication of these findings in other studies will be important.
The second project was not designed as an exact replication of the first.

body_content.explanation: the process by which organisms and genetic or other structures make exact copies of themselves:
examples: The medication will slow down the replication of the virus.
These chemicals increase the number of DNA replications in the target cell population.
